ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor

Class StyleEditorTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JTree
            • ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor.StyleEditorTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Selectable, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<StyleEditorTree>, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable

    public class StyleEditorTree
extends javax.swing.JTree
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.lang.Comparable<StyleEditorTree>, Selectable
    The style editor tree used in the StyleEditorFrame.
    Author:
    Eric Marinier
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • updateTree

        public void updateTree()
        Updates all of the nodes in the tree, which will forward the message to their panels.

      • updateTreeRendering

        public void updateTreeRendering()
        Updates the visual rendering of the tree nodes. This causes the tree renderer to update the appearance. Note: This update may not happen immediately. It will likely be scheduled on the EDT.

      • setTreeName

        public void setTreeName(java.lang.String name)

        Parameters:
        name - The name to set.

      • moveSlot

        public boolean moveSlot(int source,
               int destination)
        Moves the source slot to the destination slot. The source slot will replace the destination slot's position and the destination slot and all slots farther away from the backbone will be pushed away one slot. The gap that was created from moving the source slot will be collapsed as appropriate.
        Parameters:
        source - The slot number of the source slot.
        destination - The slot number of the destination slot.
        Returns:
        The result of the move.

      • getPath

        public javax.swing.tree.TreePath getPath(javax.swing.tree.TreeNode node)

      • moveLegendItemStyle

        public boolean moveLegendItemStyle(int sourceLegendStyleIndex,
                          int sourceLegendItemStyleIndex,
                          int destinationLegendStyleIndex,
                          int destinationLegendItemStyleIndex)
        Moves the location of the source legend item style to the destination.
        Parameters:
        sourceLegendStyleIndex - The source legend style index of the node to move.
        sourceLegendItemStyleIndex - The source legend item style index of the node to move.
        destinationLegendStyleIndex - The destination legend style index of the node to move.
        destinationLegendItemStyleIndex - The destination legend item style index of the node to move.
        Returns:
        The result of the transfer.

      • getSelectedNode

        public StyleEditorNode getSelectedNode()
        Returns:
        The last selected path component node or NULL. This makes no guarantees about which node is returned if multiple nodes are selected.

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Attempts to "delete" the tree by removing all of its nodes appropriately. This is important because it will remove pointers to nodes that might have been established during node creation.

        Specified by:
